get.description: Get metadata for adding liquidity into Raydium's CLMM.

schema.description: The raydium Concentrated Liquidity Pool ID

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for adding liquidity into Raydium's CLMM.

schema.description: The raydium Concentrated Liquidity Pool ID
The amount of liquidity to add. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL
The percentage of liquidity to add
The address of the position to add liquidity to. If not provided, first available position will be used.

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for removing liquidity from Raydium's CLMM.

schema.description: The raydium Concentrated Liquidity Pool ID

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for removing liquidity from Raydium's CLMM.

schema.description: The raydium Concentrated Liquidity Pool ID
The percentage of liquidity to remove
The address of the position to remove liquidity from. If not provided, first available position will be used.

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for adding liquidity into Raydium's AMM.

schema.description: ID of the Standard AMM pool

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for adding liquidity into Raydium's AMM.

schema.description: ID of the Standard AMM pool
The percentage of liquidity to add
The amount of liquidity to add. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for removing liquidity from Raydium's AMM.

schema.description: ID of the Standard AMM pool

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for removing liquidity from Raydium's AMM.

schema.description: ID of the Standard AMM pool
The percentage of liquidity to remove

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for staking RAY.

schema.description: The percentage of RAY to stake
The amount of RAY to stake. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 RAY

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

description.example: Add liquidity to earn fees and rewards

post.description: Generate a transaction for unstaking RAY.

schema.description: The percentage of RAY to unstake
The amount of RAY to unstake. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 RAY

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction
